definition: to cause or lead to sth bad
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to

sentences.english: It's too salty-tonight's dish, I must keep drinking more water.
sentences.chinese: 今晚的菜很咸，害得我饭后要不停的喝水。

sentences.english: Li's family lost a third of their wheat crop this year because of the sand.
sentences.chinese: 今年的沙尘暴，害得李壮损失了三成的小麦。

sentences.english: I was still balancing the matter in my mind .
sentences.chinese: 我心里正在权衡利害得失。

sentences.english: He would be play mad after drunk, North Korea cause I had neighbors running.
sentences.chinese: 他醉酒后就会耍酒疯，害得我只好朝邻居家跑。

sentences.english: L ast week, I went to a dinner party that gave me a bout of indigestion.
sentences.chinese: 上周我去参加了一个晚宴，结果害得我消化不良。

sentences.english: Qingyun feels guilty for indirectly causing Zhengchu to land in his current state.
sentences.chinese: 青云觉得自己间接害得正初一无所有，于是深感内疚。

sentences.english: Is this small pearly face, injury he this big half month all and the wife is in Cold War.
sentences.chinese: 就是这个小白脸，害得他这大个半月都跟老婆在冷战。

sentences.english: I read your sentence and it'll kill me, cause you haven't write any interpunction .
sentences.chinese: 我念了你的话，因为没有标点符号，害得我差点断气。

sentences.english: I used to be naughty, Haide you told me the patience and time.
sentences.chinese: 以前是我淘气，害得你对我一次次的忍让。

sentences.english: You gave me the wrong address and made me go all that way for nothing.
sentences.chinese: 你给我的地址不对，害得我白跑了一趟。

sentences.english: Harm the several grade six big brother all laugh and cry.
sentences.chinese: 害得这几位六年级的大哥哥全都哭笑不得。

definition: if it were not for/but for
to involve/to implicate sb/to spread to others (harm, trouble, damage etc)
Goddam!/goddamn/wretched
erhua variant of 差點|差点[cha4 dian3]
almost/nearly
to get sb involved in one's trouble/Taiwan pr. [dai4 lei4]
fortunately/luckily/(sarcastic) fancy that, how fortunate!
erhua variant of 差一點|差一点[cha4 yi1 dian3]
to avoid/so as to save (money or time)
perfectly all right/without rhyme or reason
bastard (insult)/son of a bitch
(idiomatic usage) with great difficulty/to have a hard time (convincing sb, relinquishing sth etc)/(literal usage) so easy
see 他媽的|他妈的[ta1 ma1 de5]
scoundrel/bastard/hoodlum/wretch
bastard/wretch/scoundrel
alas/oh dear
interjection or grunt of agreement or recognition (e.g. yes, it's me!)/to sigh
